properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Warning issued January 17 at 1:05PM EST until January 18 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Significant lakeshore flooding expected.

* WHERE...St. Clair and Macomb Counties.

* WHEN...From 10 AM to 10 PM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Numerous roads closed and low lying property
including parking lots, lawns, and homes and businesses will
be inundated near the lake. Some shoreline erosion will occur.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong south-southwest winds during the day
Saturday around 30 mph will lead to elevated water levels
particularly around Harsen's Island and Anchor Bay. Winds will
then shift to westerly Saturday night allowing the lakeshore
flooding threat to subside.
properties.instruction:
If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be
closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of
unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone
property.

NWSheadline: LAKESHORE FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 10 PM EST SATURDAY
